title: 最新高清材质修复工具MCPatcher HD 3.03版下载！
author: Lincoln
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lincoln 于 2013-3-29 12:36 编辑 


修复Minecraft 1.5+ 用这个最好！！~
1:Updated to support the new texture pack format introduced in 1.5.  
A utility to convert texture packs from the older format to the new one is included.
 2:Biome- and height-based Random Mobs and CTM.
 3:Custom compass and clock animations.
 4:Mipmapping, anti-aliasing, and anisotropic filtering options.



百度网盘
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=351563&uk=839085567
